definitions: Trusted Platform Module; a dedicated microcontroller designed to secure hardware through integrated cryptographic keys.
Total Productive Maintenance; a system of maintaining and improving the integrity of production and quality systems.
Technical Product Manager; a role focused on the technical aspects of product development and strategy.
examples: The laptop requires a TPM 2.0 chip for the update.
Our factory implemented TPM to reduce equipment downtime.
The TPM coordinated with the engineering team on the API design.
